# AI Unfiltered - Full Article List

> This file contains recent AI news articles for consumption by LLMs and AI agents.
> Updated every 4 hours. Links to original sources.

### Zhipu AI Open-Sources Lightweight Model GLM-4.7-Flash, Debuts MLA Architecture
- Source: Pandaily
- Category: chinese-ai
- URL: https://pandaily.com/zhipu-ai-open-sources-lightweight-model-glm-4-7-flash-debuts-mla-architecture
- Summary: Excerpt): Zhipu AI has open-sourced GLM-4.7-Flash, a 30B-parameter MoE model that activates only 3B during inference. Notably, it debuts the MLA architecture for efficiency and runs at 43 tokens/sec on an Apple M5 laptop.

- Summary: Alibaba Cloud's PolarDB database has launched an AI Lakehouse (Lakebase), enabling unified management of multi-modal data and in-database AI inference, thus positioning itself as an "AI-ready database."

- Source: Pandaily
- Category: chinese-ai

- Summary: A joint Siemens and Tencent YouTu Lab research team developed AdaptCLIP, a framework achieving state-of-the-art zero-shot anomaly detection across industrial and medical datasets without needing target-domain fine-tuning.
